Title: The Informant (No. 118)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Noah Schechter, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: When Red directs the Task Force to find a Blacklister who sells sensitive information; Ressler finds himself at risk of exposure; Liz plans her next move.
